name: Mesclun Salad With Raspberry-Walnut Vinaigrette
description: The dressing can be made and the greens washed one day ahead and refrigerated.
keywords: mesclun, raspberry vinegar, walnut oil, raw
recipeIngredient: 9 or 10 ounces mesclun or other greens

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and dry the greens, and place in refrigerator in a plastic bag.
Whisk the vinegar, oil and mustard together; cover and refrigerate.
To serve, bring dressing to room temperature. Just before serving, toss the greens with dressing.
